title: Kim, Marilyn, and Why Preserving Historical Fashion Matters with Sarah Scaturro
itunes:title: Kim, Marilyn, and Why Preserving Historical Fashion Matters with Sarah Scaturro
description:
The recent public outcry surrounding Kim Kardashian's wearing of Marilyn Monroe's dress introduced many to the field of fashion conservation for the first time. In light of the controversy, leading conservator Sarah Scaturro joins us to talk about why the preservation of historical dress matters. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The recent public outcry surrounding Kim Kardashian's wearing of Marilyn Monroe's dress introduced many to the field of fashion conservation for the first time. In light of the controversy, leading conservator Sarah Scaturro joins us to talk about why the preservation of historical dress matters. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: dressed, dressed podcast, fashion history, fashion, dress history, Sarah Scaturro, fashion conservation, textile conservation, conservation, dressed the history of fashion
